<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Find annotations</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/v1/grafana/api/annotations/"}></MethodEndpoint>



Searches for annotations in the Grafana database.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"from","schema":{"description":"Epoch datetime in milliseconds. Optional.","type":"integer"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"to","schema":{"description":"Epoch datetime in milliseconds. Optional.","type":"integer"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"limit","schema":{"description":"Optional - default is 100. Max limit for results returned.","type":"integer"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"alertId","schema":{"description":"Optional. Find annotations for a specified alert.","type":"integer"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"dashboardId","schema":{"description":"Optional. Find annotations that are scoped to a specific dashboard","type":"integer"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"panelId","schema":{"description":"Optional. Find annotations that are scoped to a specific panel","type":"integer"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"userId","schema":{"description":"Optional. Find annotations created by a specific user","type":"integer"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"type","schema":{"description":"Optional. Return alerts or user created annotations","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"in":"query","name":"tags","schema":{"description":"Optional. Use this to filter global annotations. Global annotations are annotations from an annotation data source that are not connected specifically to a dashboard or panel. To do an “AND” filtering with multiple tags, specify the tags parameter multiple times e.g. tags=tag1&tags=tag2.         ","type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful query

schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Execution error, if present","example":""}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"url"}
